Back To Recipes

recipe

Ingredients

Avacado 5½ ounces
2 Garlic Cloves 2 units
Red Onion 1.7 ounces and wash
Lime 1½ Tbsp
Salt 4 dashs
Black Pepper 5 dashs
2 Jalapenos 2 units and wash
Cilantro .1 ounce and wash

Nutrition

0 calories (Avacado/Garlic Clove...Data Missing)

0 sodium (Avacado/Garlic Clove...Data Missing)

0 sugar (Avacado/Garlic Clove...Data Missing)

0 fiber (Avacado/Garlic Clove...Data Missing)

0 protein (Avacado/Garlic Clove...Data Missing)

0 total_cost (Avacado/Garlic Clove...Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 0 Minutes

Get out scale
Put string chopper on scale and tar
Put in 5½ ounces Avacado
Put in 2 Garlic Cloves
Put in 1.7 ounces Red Onion
Put in 1½ Tbsp Lime
Put in 4 dashs Salt
Put in 5 dashs Black Pepper
Put in 2 Jalapenos
Put in the leaves only, (NO STEMS) .1 ounce Cilantro
Pull string to puree

Ingredients

Avacado 5½ ounces
2 Garlic Cloves 2 units
Red Onion 1.7 ounces and wash
Lime 1½ Tbsp
Salt 4 dashs
Black Pepper 5 dashs
Habanero ½ unit and wash
Mango ½ ounce and wash
Cilantro .1 ounce and wash

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 0 Minutes

Get out scale
Put in 5½ ounces Avacado
Put string chopper on scale and tar
Put in 2 Garlic Cloves
Put in 1.7 ounces Red Onion
Put in 1½ Tbsp Lime
Put in 4 dashs Salt
Put in 5 dashs Black Pepper
Put in Habanero
Put in ½ ounce Mango
Put in the leaves only, (NO STEMS) .1 ounce Cilantro
Pull string to puree
